intro: Hauya longicornuta var. ovalifolia, commonly known as the oval-leaf hauya, is a tropical plant characterized by its elongated, ovate leaves that are typically arranged alternately along the stem. Its flowers are small and clustered in inflorescences, often displaying a range of colors from pink to white.
